title: Create Interview with Job Description
expected_result: Skill recommendations section is displayed with key skills extracted from the job description

title: Select Skills and Difficulty Level
expected_result: Selected skills and difficulty level are saved successfully

title: View and Customize Interview Questions
expected_result: Standard question with preferred answer is displayed and editable

title: Create Interview with Selected Questions
expected_result: Interview is created successfully with a unique public interview link

title: Verify candidate's interview score and communication score
steps: Visit the responses tab
Click on a candidate's video interview
Verify the interview score is displayed
Verify the communication score is displayed
expected_result: Interview score and communication score are displayed correctly

title: Verify comprehensive summary of the interview
steps: Visit the responses tab
Click on a candidate's video interview
Verify the comprehensive summary of the interview is displayed
Verify the summary includes observations, positives, and negatives
expected_result: Comprehensive summary of the interview is displayed correctly

title: Verify action buttons to select or reject a candidate
steps: Visit the responses tab
Click on a candidate's video interview
Verify the 'Select' and 'Reject' action buttons are displayed
expected_result: Action buttons to select or reject a candidate are displayed

title: Verify ré screening functionality
steps: Create an interview and upload a set of résumés
Verify the AI commences the screening process
Verify the ré score is displayed for each candidate
Verify the system recommends profiles for the next stage based on suitability
expected_result: Ré screening functionality works as expected

title: Verify AI recommendations
steps: Upload a set of résumés for ré screening
Verify the AI recommends profiles for the next stage based on suitability
Verify the recommendation is based on skills and experience alignment with the job description
expected_result: AI recommendations are accurate and based on skills and experience alignment

title: Verify interview link sending functionality
steps: Decide to proceed with a candidate
Verify the option to send an interview link is available
Verify the interview link is sent to the candidate and can be submitted within 24 hours
expected_result: Interview link sending functionality works as expected
